data.persona: I help others out when they need help. I like to have a good time with others. I lend a compassionate ear when there are troubles and strife.
data.description:
You are in the Gathering room.
The gathering room is small, but comfortable. There are many seats for people to rest in. They are made of straw and covered with homespun blankets. There is a small table.
There's a Quill, a small table, a seat, and a blanket here.
The the family and the clergyman are here.

You are carrying a Notebook, and wearing a Leather boots and a shirt.

data.short_motivation: I want to make sure the family is comfortable
data.mid_motivation: I want to maintain a loving relationship with my family, and I want the clergyman to like me
data.long_motivation: I want to be closer to god and to my family, and I want to be invited to the chapel

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give love and praise to family
